portfolio.title: Echos of Astra
portfolio.description: Meet Astra our AI dream interpreter, Astra allows you to save past interpretations and learns to recognize patterns within your dreams to give a more accurate interpretation everytime you journal one. Developed collaboratively with my team, Astra represents our collective effort to enhance your dream analysis experience.

portfolio.title: Roomeo
portfolio.description: This appliction developed by my team and I, is a roomate matching website designed to find you the perfect roomate based in Miami, simply sign up, fill out our detailed survey, and find your perfect roomate

portfolio.title: Cryptos and Comics
portfolio.description: I contributed to a team project creating a cryptocurrency tracker app that also features random jokes. Combining real-time crypto data with humor, our app offers an engaging and entertaining user experience.

portfolio.title: Tech Blog
portfolio.description: This application is a CMS-style blog site similar to a Wordpress site, where developers can publish their blog posts and comment on other developersâ€™ posts as well.

portfolio.title: Weather Dashboard
portfolio.description: Using an API this application will create a 5 day weather forecast, inlcuding humidity, windspeed, and uv index you can look at the coditions of any city of your choice, a log will also be kept of recent searches so you can easily access them again

portfolio.title: Note Taker
portfolio.description: This application uses an Express.js back end and will save and retrieve note data from a JSON file. Users can keep track of notes easly as well as delete or edit past saved notes

portfolio.title: Password Generator
portfolio.description: This application allows the user to randomly generate a password and choose if they wish to include capital letters, lowercase, numbers, or special characters

portfolio.title: E-commerce Database
portfolio.description: This is a back end database for an e-commerce site. using an Express.js API to use Sequelize to interact with a MySQL database. Github repo is linked below

portfolio.title: JATE text editor
portfolio.description: Jate text editor is a single-page application that meets the progressive web application criteria. It features a number of data persistence techniques that serve as redundancy in case one of the options is not supported by the browser. The application will also function offline.
